attributes.action: act on behalf the English people to free English teacher Gillian Gibbons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to express the opinions on the English teacher that has been jailed in Sudan for blasphemy. This lady has given her life to teaching and while in the course of her duty she has been convicted of a ridiculous sentence. I understand that recently protesters in Sudan have campaigned for her to be executed. Surely this government will not accept these actions and intervene before this idea becomes an eventuality.

rejection.details: This petition is no longer relevant.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
